en: I'm interested in the history of Australia.

en: I think eighth grade was the most fun.

en: Tom's parents both died while he was still a small child.

en: I should have come here by bicycle.

en: I should've come here by bicycle.
I'm glad your cold is better.
I'm glad you're over your cold.
I'm glad you've gotten over your cold.
I'm glad that you're over your cold.

en: I should have read the instructions.

Are there any cute girls in your class?

en: If you're tired, go to bed already.

en: Are you interested in baseball, Tom?

en: Thank you for extending to me such a warm welcome.

Don't come to school if you have a cold.
